fsrtool.name: fsrtool_snow_kills
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_snow_kills` ( `kill_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `timestamp` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pilot_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `corpID` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `system_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `main_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `loss` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', UNIQUE KEY `kill_id` (`kill_id`,`pilot_id`,`corpID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
